Title: Relates to notification of a data breach
Summary: Provides that a business must provide notification of a data breach within 15 days of such breach; includes the department of financial services to the list of entities that must be notified of a data breach that affects any New York resident.
LawCode: Amd ยง899-aa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to notification of a data breach
